desc: There was never a better feeling than rewarding yourself with a cold beer at the top of that mountain! Because beer tastes better on top we created a hiking guy and girl, enjoying a nice cold one at the top of a summit. We personally heat press all of our hats in our home. Order with or without a bottle opener. Cheers!

layout.text: We heat press our hat logos at home and personally install a bottle opener at your request, to make it conveniently available for that special beer!
